name: Apple Reminders Controls
description: Quickly manage Apple Reminders. View, create, and delete completed reminders.

commands.name: My Reminders
commands.description: Open Reminders app to view and complete reminders.

commands.name: Create Reminder
commands.description: Open Reminders app and open the new reminder page.

args: osascript -e 'tell application "Reminders" to activate' -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "n" using {command down}'

commands.name: Clear Completed Reminders
commands.description: Remove all reminders marked as completed in all lists.

args: osascript -e 'tell application "Reminders" to repeat with lst in lists' -e 'tell lst to delete (reminders whose completed is true)' -e 'end repeat'
